content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of the 4th of july at 9:35pm we went outside to observe the neighbors lighting off fireworks.  i observed what i first thought to be a low helecopter but the light emited was unique and fuzzy.  it was mostly red with pulsating green and with a red / yellow orb circle around the predominately red color.
the weather condition was with low thin cloud cover this was observed to be under the clouds, maybe just within the lower level of clouds.
there was no sound detected.  it traveled in a straight path from se to ne direction.  it was observed for apporximatly 40 seconds.
i was able to retrieve a pair of nikon 10x50 binoculars to observe it's departure in the ne direction. i clearly saw a bright red center with a hazey red orb around the brighter center.
this incident was observed by my wife and i.
content.summary: Observed by myself and wife, pulsing red/green orb through binoculars

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were returning from mcdonalds at around 10pm(despite the late night food run neither of us partake in drugs of any type), and we saw two groups of lights at no more than 500 feet from the ground.  they was definitely a solid object between the lights, but we could not make out what it was.  it was moving far to slowly and its lights were all wrong for it to be plane(s) or helicopter(s).  i am a pilot and i have never seen anything like this. it was completeley silent, but the lights were not like a chinese lantern. if anyone can help me identify these objects pleas let me know.
content.summary: Strange lights and objects

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting out 10pm ish.  saw golden & red orb. too low to be an aircraft, too high to have come from the ground.  six of these orbs, spaced about 3 minutes apart, travled the exact same route.  it was very very precise in it's movement. 

i have also seen them two other times in the late evening since the first sighting, including last night.  driving with a friend, and we were actually talking about them because her grandkids also saw them last week and took pictures.  as we were talking i saw one in the sky.  we pulled off the road and watched in wonderment as a total of 5, again precisely spaced apart, traveled in a northbound direction and then eventually disappeared from sight.  we had also seen a single one earlier in the evening while at fireworks.  solid light, not blinking.  i knew it was something i have never seen before, and assumed it to be ufo in origin.
content.summary: Multiple, identical red & gold orbs traveling in a straight line

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside and looked up in the sky and noticed this bullet shape object flying in the clouds went in to get my camera took a picture and it disappeared. came back inside and then went back outside and in the same spot i saw the other one but this one was way bigger and i knew i could get some pictures of it. so i ran inside got my camera and this is what i saw...
content.summary: Silver bullet like shape flying cloud level with no sound

content.detailedDescription: Myself and three friends were camping in an open area.  my friend stated look how fast this jet is coming and it lit up and travelled a good distance much faster than any aircraft i have ever seen it would light up slightly and turn at 90 degrees and back irrracticaly . when it turned it would light again. then it was out of sight .It only glowed when it would turn. and made no noise at all and there was no other light except the glow when it maneuvered.
content.summary: Flying at cloud level sharp turns and glowed when manuvered brief glow  faster than any aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
i was walking from one barracks to another, and something caught my eye in the sky.  i looked up and saw a round object, rolling and tumbling, leaving a long luminous trail behind it, and the trail disappeared as the object traveled.  to make an accurate description, it looked like a basketball, with holes in it, and smoke or vapor was coming out of every hole as it rolled and tumbled in the sky.  i watched it for 15-20 minutes as it traveled in the sky.  the outside temp was -20 degrees, so i stayed outside and watched it in the clear night sky as long as i could stand the cold.  during the time i watched it, it didn't travel all the way across the horizon, but was still moving slowly when i went inside.  i yelled at another man who was outside, and said, "do you see that?"  he answered, "yeah, but i don't want to."
     a few years later, i wrote a report about the sighting and sent it to the smithsonian institution in washington, dc.  they answered with this statement:  "what you saw was a meteor.  they can do strange things sometimes."  
     i've seen many meteors in my 75 years of life, and that was no meteor.  for one thing, it didn't move very fast.  and then, it wasn't bright like a meteor, but was like a dull brown.  there was no fire visible.
content.summary: Smoky brown ball rolling and tumbling in the sky, leaving a luminous trail.
content.locationName: Happy Valley-Goose Bay, Newfoundland and Lab

content.detailedDescription:
on the way home from a friend my girlfriend looks up at the night sky and says  look at that those lights i instantly knew what should was talking about. we watched for the first time in our lives anything like this has ever happened to either of us i reached for my phone off course it was dead my girlfriend grabbed gets her album was full so we just went back to watching them after about 5 minutes  they were flying in a prefect triangle form never breaking pace of divergent speed from the next the all of a sudden the bottom right light of the triangle disappeared then the left and finally the top it was incredible it was just an instant if you blinked you would've  missed them flying away at an incredible speed much faster than anything i've ever seen!

 in between  highway 114  and 170  on 377
content.summary: 3  orange/yellow  lights  moving across the sky one by one accelerated  to unkown speed

content.detailedDescription: On july 1 2013 in joplin missouri i got home around 930. i let my dogs out and was standing on my deck when i looked up and saw what i thought was an airplane on fire. it looked about the same distance i have noticed small aircraft flying maybe 10000 feet. it began to hover. no movement or sound. i ran to get my binoculars. when i got back it began moving in an arc toward the south. while i was watching it another appeared in the same location as the first. i then looked at it and was able to see with the binoculars 4 black round spots in the center of the red and yellow glow. the 2nd one then moved in the exact same arc and then stopped above the first and was still. the first then just disappeared from few and soon after so did the second. i am a professional intelligent grown woman who saw something i can't explain. it wasn't fireworks or chinese lanterns. i have lived long enough to know the difference. i have since googled this and found there are people all over the world who have experienced this. i think about it often as i am the type of person who wants to know the answer but perhaps there is none. the entire episode was approx. 10 minutes.
content.summary: Observed two glowing orbs in sky.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and me were outside on the deck watching the thunderstorm approach from the southwest when out of no where a reddish orange fog or cloud appeared. it started out dull in brightness but soon got brighter and brighter and was in my opinion roughly 10 to 15 miles away. as it was becoming brighter it was making its way towards our direction from the southwest and the closes it came was roughly 1/4 of a mile from us. this event lasted roughly 10 minutes and it gave my wife and i a strong feeling of eeriness as it was making progress towards us and becoming bigger and bigger. the weird thing is we never saw a distinct detailed craft, we only saw a glowing fog or cloud that seemed to have intelligent control. this dense fog or cloud just dissipated after getting that close to us and it took roughly 2-3 seconds for it to dissappear. if anything has any idea what this was please add on your opinion.  also there was no noise only a creepy feeling.
content.summary: Reddish orange glowing fog or cloud was observed beside a thunderstorm from our deck.

content.detailedDescription: Second sighting in 4 days. rumson n.J. location close to atlantic highlands sighting. just a few miles. driving in a car talking to friend about first sighting, and they appeared again, this time a dark object as well. should have stopped car but we were in shock.
content.summary: Second time in 4 days, rumson location close to atlantic highlands sighting. driving in a car talking to friend about first sighting, and they appeared again, this time a dark object as well.

content.detailedDescription: Watched white weather balloon with a long string hanging from it.  at bottom of string was a shiny reflective rectangle.
content.summary: White weather balloon with long tail

content.detailedDescription: Was driving home from work (roughly 11:45pm) noticed off to my right 3 bright red glowing objects. saw from a distance at 1st thought helicopters but as i got closer, they were low, just over the 2 story apartment building. as i got closer they were also a lot smaller. hard to describe shape really the glow was more square shaped. the closest one hovered over the apt bldg then started going straight down slowly then disappeared. the 2nd moved off toward the trees and i lost the sight of that one. the 3rd moved off in to the distance then just disappeared. what i find very strange is i've seen this before. a couple months back, not sure how long it's been, but under a year. same bright red glowing object hovering. i was also on my way home from work, roughly about the same time, only there was 1 and it was not even in the same area. this was about 10-15 miles apart. that one looked just like the 3 of these. i was really close to this one. i stopped ny car, got out and it was right above me. hovered then moved really slowly, like gliding off to the northeast. scared me enough that i actually called 911. after i saw it, i saw a helicopter in the area. not sure if it was in relation to the same thing. all i know is my family thinks i'm crazy, but i know what i saw. i did get a quick clip on my phone of the 3rd one off in the distance, but you can't really make anything out and it was way off in the distance.
content.summary: 3 bright red lights site hovering about 50ft apart. roughly the size of a basketball.

content.detailedDescription: I was riding my bike to subway when i noticed an orange randomly flickering orb of light flying across the sky. it suddenly turned to the left, continued moving. i began to take a digital video with my phone, then shortly afterwards it stopped and slowly faded away until i couldn't see it any longer.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: An orange flickering orb of light was seen flying across the sky. it suddenly turned to the left, continued moving, then stopped and slowly faded from view

content.detailedDescription:
Nas north island. coronado, ca 2:30am 1jul2013 w, sw, and se

please only use my first name if this is reported to anyone or in media.

i have been inspecting helicopters as a plane captain sh-60h,f,s mh-60r for over 2 years at nas north island about 1-2 miles from the pacific. have been working from 10:30pm-7:00am for the past 9 months. this is not the first time i have seen something interesting, however this was the most obvious to anyone focused on the sky. i had just finished inspecting a bird when, i saw a very distant light that seemed to be changing from blue to red to white, and i thought it was a star. it was very far away directly w, as we have a true north line 200 yds from my flightline and verifies it was directly w.. i watched it for about 5 minutes, then started looking around the sky to see if i could spot anything else. i saw another similar looking light emitting object in the sw. they were the same distance, it appeared, and i started looking around the entire sky to try to spot anything else. i then saw an object closer, but still very high flying directly over the base heading se with 3 flashing white lights. i could not take any photo or film because it is fod and not allowed for me to have while performing my duties. even if i did i do not believe i would have been able to catch much because it was so high, but the lights appeared to flash in sequence and i believe i saw the outline of a triangle when the lights would flash and illuminate. i have seen information on the tr-3b craft before, and i am not certain but i believe that is what i saw. however, it was flying slow, like a plane and not like a super fast ufo zooming off with hypersonic speed. it made no noise, which troubled me as i hear all kinds of military aircraft, as i work on a flight line next with multiple airstrips and i recognize all kinds of aircraft.
i pointed it out to a friend of mine who was also inspecting the helicopter and he saw what i pointed out but did not offer any opinion. i have been looking at the sky every night since october, as i work 10:30pm-7am and this is the interesting thing i have seen. i have friends that have seen other things, and i have as well but this is the one that caught my attention most as i am very skeptical considering how many types of aircraft fly from and over our base. i have seen many shooting stars and interesting things, but i usually just pass them off as it is something from the base. after i saw the objects, the sky got cloudy and was then cloud covered. i drove away from my job to a darker area to try to see the objects better and it was completely cloudy when i got closer to the ocean and further from the city and base lights. i was not able to see any of the 3 again.
content.summary: While inspecting helicopter at nas north island i believe i saw a tr-3b or something like it on monday at 2:30am

content.detailedDescription: Just after midnight july 4th, i noticed a light out side my window in the distance. i went outside to check it out. it was to my south and fairly low to the horizon. it was stationary and at first glance looked like a star, but i noticed it seem to change color and pulsate. i went and got my son and some binoculars. my son saw it as well and  we both thought it could be some sort of unidentified flying object. through the binocs you could tell it was changing colors, pulsing, and stationary and seemed closer and larger than the stars.
content.summary: Minnesota sighting july 4th 2013

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: A friend seen it first said wtf is that we both watched it stand still move 5 different times in different direction  for about 10 mins then it moved faster than a jet and was gone . i have seen all thing i know that fly but i have never seen this before move the way it did and as fast as it did not a man made thing used lights to move around 3 different ones to move  .We tried using phones to record it but would not show on screen
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,   Cylinder,   Diamond,   Disc,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Moved unlike anything seen before using lights it would go blurry then move and stand still moved faster then a jet

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on rt. 2 from monroe toward everett, july 3, 2013, about 1:10 pm, i noticed a single white or reflective object far up in the sky slightly southward of my direction. this section of rt 2 is flat and wide open so i had no trees or anything obstructing the view for several minutes. at first, i assumed it was a plane, but then every 10 seconds or so i'd glance at it again and it was not moving at all. the not moving was what really caught my attention. i'd like to believe it was just a commercial jetliner, only problem was (a) it had no wings (b) it wasn't moving at all over the course of several minutes (c) it occasionally glowed a little even in broad daylight -- just a slight halo of pale light.  i'd like to believe it was a single solitary lenticular cloud except that it was too uniform in shape and too solid-looking. there were absolutely no clouds anywhere in the entire sky at this time. after a couple-three minutes of driving while intermittently glancing at it, it vanished.
content.summary: White oval or cigar shape with slight glow at times in broad daylight, no clouds

content.detailedDescription:
gilmer, texas, december 21st approximately 3:30 p.M. - 3:45 p.M.

father was very ill, lung cancer.  he relied on oxygen machine, the kind that's plugged into the wall.  a few weeks earlier we had a storm and electricity went out.  we scrambled to get his portable oxygen.  scary situation.  

weather reports said we would be having storms coming in so i decided i would go to my house, (staying with my father providing care) and get my generator, get it ready just in case.  i hooked up my father's utility trailer and traveling east on highway 154, just after passing fm 852, a few cars backed up in some light traffic so i was barely moving and something caught my eye in the upper left of my windshield.  i lean forward and see it's four or five black birds.  then i see just to the right of where the birds were, directly up and very, very low, 5-7 large white circles/spheres.  they were so white it reminded me of a white balloon, the kind that is a little fluorescent looking.  these spheres were very low and maybe the size of a volkswagon or a little bigger.  they were somewhat stationary but then started slightly moving/intermingling then just to the right of the spheres started appearing numerous white triangles.  each triangle joined together perfectly and made three rows.  the outer triangles, the way they looked joined together, appeared they made a complete circle of triangles from my angle.  the triangles were fully suspended, not moving at all.  no sound/noise.  i noticed as the triangles were forming and joining there was only maybe two spheres left; like they were changing into these triangles and multiplying like times 10.

since i was driving slowly at the time i viewed this maybe 15-20 seconds.  i couldn't believe what i was seeing.  i pulled over at what use to be the speedy pantry and turned around, driving back and looking up didn't see it, so turned around on fm 852 and drove slowly looking up where i had seen it and it was no longer there.  to this day when i pass through there i still look up.  

"describe your feelings, reactions and actions during and after sighting the object?"  

well, i wasn't afraid.  i was just dumbfounded and in disbelief.  i remember reaching for my phone then remembering my phone hadn't been working since the end of november.  i could answer an incoming call by flipping the phone open but couldn't dial out, couldn't text, couldn't retrieve contacts, none of the buttons worked.  my sister and i were so busy taking care of our father it wasn't a priority to get it replaced at that time.  i only told a few people about it since it happened.  didn't want to be labeled a "nut".  even thought about calling the sheriff's office and talking to some deputies i know to see if anyone else reported anything. checked the paper(s) to see if any other sitings. did a lot of online searches to see if anyone else saw what i saw.  i made a hand drawing of what i saw.  i also remember when driving thinking, i am now under this thing and then trying to look back to see if i could still see it.  did a google earth search to see just per chance was there anything there at one time.  there is something that looks like a sun flare but that is it.

i guess there is a number of reasons i didn't report it at the time.  not sure really who to report it to or if i should.  not wanting to be labeled, still dealing with the loss of my father since feb., and having no photo or video of what i saw, people might not believe me.  

okay, i've reported it and hope this is never used against me in the future. (lol)
content.summary: Broad daylight, 5-7 large very white spheres/circles turned into 50-70 very white triangles connecting as one in three rows, maybe 20 across each row. as they were connecting the spheres/circles reduced to only one or two.

content.detailedDescription:
Object appeared in se sky, approx 35 degrees above horizon. moved ne.
orange/red in color. round. appeared larger at first, then became smaller. 
no sound.

1. sitting on front porch, facing e
2. no other objects/clouds in sky. object was very bright.
3. unknown
4. moved se to ne, passing behind trees. elapsed time from first sight until disappearance approx 2 minutes.  traveled horizontally.
5. "what is that?"
6. object got progressively smaller and appeared to vanish/disappear in ne sky


note about attached video:
the movement of the object in the video is result of shaky camera work. the object moved in a direct path.
content.summary: Red/orange ball moving se to ne

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting in our hottub with a couple of friends in our backyard which was not lit with any lite source. around 11p.M. i desided to get out of the tub and head to the pool. apon getting out of the tub i scanned the sky admiring the stars and beautiful night sky. looking to the south just over the tree line a formation of three bright lites moved in a very wide triagle formation from south to north. i said outloud "what the hell is that" and directed my companions eyes to the lights. only the female of our couple found them in the sky and also witnesed the lites moving south to north. after viewing for a few seconds the the lites still in a perfect triagle formation and still traveling northward started to fade and dissapeared. i scanned the sky for a few minutes but was unable locate the formation again.
content.summary: Three bright lights in a large triangle formation moving south to north

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i went for a drive around lake jacomo july 3 2013 on woods chapel rd. we saw some fireworks when we noticed a group of lights that weren't fading out.There were six yellow orange lights that were hovering higher in the sky. they were in a crescent shape and did not blink like airplane lights. we pulled off the road into a parking lot to watch them to see what they were doing. slowly the lights just disappeared one at a time. earlier in the evening there had been a thunderstorm with a lot of lightening. in fact all of the traffic lights and street lights were not working which made it seem spooky. we also passed a repair truck driving slowly looking for something wrong with the lines. we made a remark to one another that it made us feel like dreyfus in "close encounters".  when we drove back to the road keeping our eye on the sky there had been a wreck of 3 cars at the intersection;it was so dark without the lights it seemed really scary to me.  i probably should say family has had other events with this subject. we even had  budd hopkins come to our home to investigate our family and our various events throughout our lives. so this is just another one to add to our history.
content.summary: Husband and i saw 6solid colored lights hovering in a crescent shape no sound then slowly disappear  one at a time

content.detailedDescription: I glanced at the sky by chance and noticed a strangely high and larger circular ufo in the sky. the object reminded me of an animal cell. not perfectly round, but a bright white light inside of a red orange outter orb, somewhat like the nucleus of an animal cell. the object started high but raised even higher to a point that was invisible to the naked eye. the object was lost from sight when it finally ascended too high to be seen.
content.summary: An orange-red glowing object with a bright white light in the middle moving ne to n then disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
i'd like to preface my story by saying that based on what i've learned about physics, it seems improbable that beings from another planet are visiting ours. the vast majority of physicists agree. on the other hand, credible witnesses have experienced events science can't explain. assuming both are true,what's left? 
  it was the fall of 1980, late saturday afternoon. the sky was a sharp bright blue without a cloud in sight. my girlfriend  and i were driving southbound along leslie st.Toward york mills rd. in suburban toronto,a busy section of town at any time. 
  she was at the wheel, which was not the norm. the passenger side window was down. i glanced up and noted the crispness of the blue overhead. as i turned my head back to watch the road, i realized my eye had caught something up above. i remember immediately saying to myself "what the heck is that little cloud doing in a perfectly clear sky?" i looked up again and saw that it wasn't a cloud at all. it appeared solid, white and it was way up there. i knew it was something odd and quickly asked my girlfriend to pull off the road.
    we turned into the parking lot of a restaurant called "teddy kennedy's ribs," on the easst side of leslie just before york mills. a group of about a dozen restaurant patrons were already gathered outside looking up at this thing. it was incredibly exciting, surreal. people were squealing and shrieking at the sight of the object. we looked at each other and asked "can you believe it?!"
   the object was rectangular in shape, reflective and white like any airplane high up there and it was huge. the first thought that popped into my head was "giant aircraft carrier." it seemed to be at least that big if not bigger. it appeared to have substance. it was bulky and long. it was too high to make out any other details. without any reference points, i judged it to be at an altitude of maybe 40,000 ft, where passenger jets fly their highest. it loped along in a striaght line north to south much slower than any jet i'd ever seen.
   it took that thing 20 minutes to cross the sky. the entire population of toronto could have seen it, if only they'd looked up.
content.summary: A massive , white rectangular object flew slowly south across the city at a  high altitude in full view of me and a group of witnesses.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside for a smoke at about 9:30pm and gazed at the stars & planes that pass through. i saw an orange glowing round disk/oval shape figure hovering and going left and right through the sky as if gravity and physics had no affect on it. there was also a plane headed in the same direction not far from the object. i don't know if it was following it or just headed in the same direction.
content.summary: Orange glowing oval/star like figure hovering moving directions while air plane following behind

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my balcony, on the 4th floor, at about 10pm, looking south. i was watching the fireworks that people were letting off and waiting for the professional show in the park nearby. i looked at the treeline about 1 km away, in a se direction, and saw 2 bright orange lights. i at first thought that it was two planes, since there's an airport nearby, but there were no flashing lights normally associated with them, and they didn't move right.

i watched them move nw circling around each other. i called my husband out to see them and we watched them start to go west. one went sw and became dim, while the other one continued west until it disappeared. i tried to videotape them, but i have a blackberry, and this one doesn't seem to take video well.

about 15 minutes later, one of the lights came back, traveling from se to nw. it didn't go in a straight path, but instead at one point did a quick direction change, like a quick left turn, and then continued on.

about 15 minutes after that, the fireworks started and the light came back again. it flew to the area of the fireworks, hovered for about a minute, then continued back in a nw direction. by this point a few of my neighbours were out watching the fireworks and i heard one of them ask her friend was the strange glowing light was.

the fireworks ended about 15 minutes later, but i did not see them after that. i barely remember the fireworks since i was concentrating too much on looking for the lights.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing lights on canada day

content.detailedDescription: I was coming off a local bus at 22.20 midnight i noticed people from two adjacent bus stops looking skywards i then looked up & noticed this bright yellow object moving slowly across the sky it was a clear night no clouds it had an outer red ring around it the people who had been observing it prior too me getting off my bus i reckon around 9 at two different bus stops witnessed this object they alighted there buse too get home i was left myself watching this craft or glowing object for 10 minutes it then proceeded to change its shape from circular to ovular shap it started to increase its speed the outer red ring became orange while the inner part stayed a yewllowish pulsating colour it sped off over the local hospital the royal infirmary going in an easterly direction this is true what i witnessed .My reaction was one of awe amazing it wasnt any conventional aeroplanes or chinese lanterns .When i noticed this object i knew it wasnt anything earthly that was my first thought still see it vivid in my mind . when i got home i phoned my brother of what id just witnessed .I tried too take a photo of it my phone didnt work .
content.summary: This object didnt land there were no entities it moved silently in the clear night sky the other witnesses i didnt know strangers at two different bus stops .

content.detailedDescription:
Sunday jan 30 2011 @ 16:30, upon arriving at my in-laws home in glen burnie  i took a photo of the front of their home. the picture was downloaded and saved to a hard drive. 

recently while reorganizing many of the pictures i viewed this one and noted a single dark colored orb  or disk with a blue aura around it. the object  seemed to be at some distance away perhaps over a thousand ft maybe more at approximately a 40 deg angle. its dimensions are unknown but appears to be fairly small in diameter maybe ~6 ft. 

since this is a discovery based upon a photo it is unknown what direction or altitude it came from or changed to. 

i'm very certain it was not dirt on the lens or a bird or other normal aerial object. it is similar in shape and color to other objects posted as ufo's. it is being reported now as a record for the data base.
content.summary: Dark colored orb type object

content.detailedDescription:
Wife was out on porch just sitting, i came out to talk to her and she asked if there was fireworks tonight i said no, wife was looking up at sky
and saw lights coming over the church across the street and  asked me what was that, and i called my son out to look at them too and we didn't know what the lights were. there were 7 red/orange colored lights that were the size between softball and basketball size that were evenly spaced
 in a triangle formation, 2 of the lights on the right hand side went out one at a time, it was moving slow between 5 and 10 miles per hour, it moved over us in a east to west direction and as it moved over us they went out one at a time. there was no sound and it was a clear night and we couldn't see anything but just the shape of the lights. the whole sighting took about 5 minutes as we
watched the lights we felt surprised and overwhelmed wanted to go grab camera but didn't because we were mesmerized by the lights. when we saw the last light go out, went inside and turned on the police scanner to see if there where other reports about the lights, the rest of the night we feeling confused about what we just seen, because we didn't know what we saw
content.summary: Observed 7 red orange lights in a triangle formation lights going out 1 at a time moveing slow in a east to west straight line.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It was sunday sept.29th 2012 at 2pm,partly cloudy day,i went outside,and notice a flash out of the corner of my eye and then saw a white orb moving from east to west under 5.000 ft slowly.I got my camera and started filming,i had 3 witness with me,i filmed 15 mins of video of the 1 ufo orb...When looking @ the video again and slowing it down at 27 to 31 secs (frame by frame) you can see another ufo orb,race in and around the stationary ufo at hyper speed,coming from the east and zig zagging and looping west,then headed back east,(the 1 ufo orb was stationary but moving slowly heading west)while slowing the film down and going through the footage frame by frame,i noticed 2 to 3 other ufo orbs looping and zig zaging across the sky in front and around the 1 ufo that was stationary.At the time we we're filming,we couldn't see the other ufos because of the speed of the objects.I estimate that the speed was 1/1000th of a second,or 5,000 mph or faster.I came to this conclusion because you can only see the ufo's at a frame to frame basis,(4 mouse clicks equals 1 second)on film.I filmed the object until it went out of site...I will send a copy to you asap,it's on youtube under (gallup ufo sept 29th 2012)youtube video quality isn't good at all,so i will send you a very good copy to your office here in nm along with a film time outline...(in addition),,,i have seen these same 3 ufo orbs again on(may 30th 2013 @ 3pm)on the east side of gallup.Hovering over the city moving slowly,blinking white and orange,when i was filming,,1 of the 3 ufo's orbs flashed at me.And the footage didn't come out...(very frustrating)....Once again on(june 1st @ 2:30pm 2013)i witnessed the same 3 ufo orbs over downtown gallup nm at about a 2.000 ft altitude,coming from the west and heading east over the city.They were zig zagging through the clouds.They were over the downtown area for 30 mins then headed east  and disappeared..I expect to see them again and i feel that this an assigned area,for these particular 3 ufo orbs..Thank you for you time...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked outside on sunday after noon-saw -ufo orb moving  from east to west @ 2pm, filmed others with it.

content.detailedDescription:
My hybrid son was taken mid april of 2012. "they used the word claimed.   i carried him for about 2 months.  i knew he was a boy and i named him drax.  named after max(his human father) and the draonian reptilians i am involved with.  during my pregnancy my ex was shut down and i was taken for several hours.  when i was coming to i saw a figure standing to the side of the bed making circles above my stomach.  i knew i had just been returned and i knew they were making one last check on the baby. he was brought to me  october-10-2012 for breastfeeding and bonding. i am sending pictures of my pregnant stomach and claw marks where he held on to my left breast as he fed from the right. he didn't mean to hurt me. there was absolutely no feeling to the red and infected looking claw marks and they were basically gone in 4 hours.  however, my right nipple felt like it had been pla ced in a vice.  the only other time i experienced that pain was when i breast fed my daughter. the tracks that were left in the snow (see videos) were left 1-28-13.  i didn't know what they were until a couple weeks later.  i was standing in my kitchen and i heard these words.......Drax tracks.  i stood in that kitchen laughing and crying.  i know it was my son who told me.  i felt it....I knew it. 

there is so much more to this than i could possibly try to write.  "they" have been manipulating my pineal gland.  they are able to use me as a computer, loading and downloading information.  i feel as if i am "ahead of time."  i have received many messages from them and continue to.  

i have many very credible witnesses.  they include an attorney, a fireman/farmer, and a prison guard.  

i have been regressed 5 times and some are recorded.  the psychologist who regressed me would be willing to speak.

i need help. i have reached out to many people. the only time i feel ok is when i am sharing what is happening to me.  some of the things that are happening are difficult to share because they make others very uncomfortable.  so i am left holding all this inside.

i have been doing illustrations and writing down everything and keeping track of dates the best i can.  

this all started in 1961 when i was 12.  it was a sighting (daylight) with several witnesses including two police officers.  i am still in contact with the chief of police from back then.  unfortunately, he is 93 and in bad health along with good and bad memory days.  he was at the station and said he fielded calls for over 20 minutes.  one of the calls was from a fellow officer at the scene and another was a city councilwoman.  i was discouraged from talking about this in hopes that i would forget.  it was the worst thing my parents could have done.  i never talked about it.....For 50 years i never talked about it.  it was only when i met a ufologist and college professor september 1st, 2011 that i opened up.  i told him of the sighting.......That's all i thought it was for 50 years.  but, i lived with ptsd and panic attacks.  i haven't had a papst smear in 20 years and still am unable to watch someone get a shot of tv.  i have always had physic abilities. he was a smart man and knew there was more to it than that so he found the regression therapist.  at the end of my first regression i felt myself immobilized and going up into the ship. 

one of the very first messages they gave me in 2011 was, "all memories are packed and taken with us in each new life."  "when the load becomes to heavy or we no longer have the energy to carry it we travel as, light knowledge energy."

"they told me to take this baton and run with it"........That is what i am trying to do.
content.summary: I believe these tracks were made by my hybrid son........They are not foot print but some kind of snow shoe........He was 9 months at the time.
